tags.name: pzsh-banner
tags.description:
Component that may contain the search or the navigation (overlayed
via absolute positioning in the pzsh-menu component), part of the
header below the topbar.

tags.name: pzsh-container
tags.description:
Full height container component that expects to be "slotted" with
header, content and footer.

slots.description: Add header, content and footer in this slot.
Slot for the icon and the text

tags.name: pzsh-hero
tags.description: Component that contains the application title, slogan and logo, below the header/banner.

tags.name: pzsh-menu
tags.description:
Responsive menu component that is coupled with the topbar component
(for mobile menu toggling and actions display on desktop) and the
banner component (nav display on desktop) via events.

slots.name: nav
slots.description:
Slot for application navigation that is visible in the
banner on desktop and moves into the hamburger menu on mobile

slots.name: items
slots.description:
Slot for menu content that is visible on the page on
desktop (typically on the left of the content) and moves into the
hamburger menu on mobile

slots.name: actions
slots.description:
Slot for application-wide menu actions (like help,
logout etc.) that are visible in the topbar on desktop and move
into the hamburger menu on mobile

tags.name: pzsh-menu-action
tags.description:
Menu action with icon and text, will be render in the menu on
mobile or in the topbar otherwise.

slots.description: Slot for the icon and the text

tags.name: pzsh-menu-divider
tags.description:
Divider to be used in the pzsh-menu component to separate menu
actions (currently only effects mobile menu).

tags.name: pzsh-menu-dropdown
tags.description:
Menu dropdown with icon and text, will be rendered as a dropdown
menu in the topbar on desktop, or with all items visible in the
hamburger menu on mobile.

slots.name: toggle
slots.description: Slot for the icon and the text of the toggle button

tags.name: pzsh-menu-dropdown-item
tags.description: Dropdown menu item with icon and text.

slots.description: Slot for the icon and the text
May contain pzsh-nav-item and pzsh-subnav components

tags.name: pzsh-nav-item
tags.description:
Application navigation item to be used in pzsh-nav and pzsh-subnav
components.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Whether the item is currently active

properties.name: active
properties.description: Whether the item is currently active

tags.name: pzsh-subnav
tags.description: Second level navigation to be use within pzsh-nav.

tags.name: pzsh-topbar
tags.description:
Top application bar that contains the logo and optional
application-wide actions that are rendered via the menu
component. The topbar is coupled with the menu component via
events.

slots.description: Slot for the logo SVG graphic
